message:
Told my farmer friends at the rally in Belagavi…our track record suggests that if there is a Govt. our farmers can trust, it's the NDA Government. 

Talked about how the Government's efforts towards increasing urea production, neem coated urea & soil health cards have benefitted farmers. Reaffirmed the need for farmers to make use of the crop insurance scheme & embrace modern irrigation practices. 

http://nm-4.com/4r2g
